Articles.Content:
Hi, everyone.

It's come to our attention that a particular alternative mod repository has gone "live." Under normal circumstances, we would not take action against a community-based repository, however we have taken measures to blacklist the name and URL of that site from the forum for these reasons:

  • It appears to scrape Spaceport entirely.
  • It promotes community-developed content whose use may be unauthorized, depending on the licenses used.

The website will continue to be blacklisted until those and other potential issues regarding it can be worked out between Squad and members of the modding community. It's important to protect the intellectual property of both parties, especially on behalf of the modders who work hard to elevate the game past even our own expectations. If you take any issue with this, please appeal to myself and the moderation team directly. Note once again that unless otherwise noted, there are no issues with any other community-backed initiatives that are being planned at this time and no similar actions will be taken against them.

Thanks.
